meanings.definition: Make changes in something established, especially by introducing new methods or ideas.
meanings.sent1: She innovated the recipe by adding a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The company innovated its products to meet customer demands.
meanings.sent3: He innovated the game by playing blindfolded - it was a fun twist!
meanings.sent4: Her innovative approach to gardening truly innovated the way we look at plants.
meanings.sent5: The young inventor innovated a machine that could do homework in seconds.

meanings.definition: Introduce something new; make changes in anything established.
meanings.sent1: The teacher innovated a new way of teaching math to her students.
meanings.sent2: The artist innovated a unique painting technique.
meanings.sent3: The chef innovated the menu by adding a dessert pizza - it was a hit!
meanings.sent4: His speech at the conference truly innovated the audience's perspective on the topic.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer innovated the runway with her bold and creative designs.
